summary.span: 提供三重資料加密標準 (3DES) 演算法的新一代密碼編譯 (CNG) 實作。

span.span: Provides a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) implementation of the Triple Data Encryption Standard (3DES) algorithm.

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify options for opening the key, such as where the key is opened from (machine or user storage) and whether to suppress UI prompting.

Creates a symmetric decryptor object.

summary.span: 使用目前的索引鍵和初始化向量 () 建立對稱 3DES 解密子物件。

span.span: Creates a symmetric 3DES decryptor object with the current key and initialization vector ().
A symmetric 3DES decryptor object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會解密加密的訊息，建立使用多載具有相同的簽章。This method decrypts an encrypted message created using the overload with the same signature.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform CreateDecryptor (byte[] rgbKey, byte[] rgbIV);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform CreateDecryptor(unsigned int8[] rgbKey, unsigned int8[] rgbIV) cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateDecryptor (rgbKey As Byte(), rgbIV As Byte()) As ICryptoTransform
public: override System::Security::Cryptography::ICryptoTransform ^ CreateDecryptor(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ rgbKey, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ rgbIV);

param.name: rgbKey
param.span: 3DES 演算法所用的祕密金鑰。

span.span: The secret key to use for the 3DES algorithm.

param.span: 金鑰大小必須是 192 位元。

span.span: The key size must be 192 bits.

param.name: rgbIV
param.span: 3DES 演算法所用的初始化向量。

span.span: The initialization vector to use for the 3DES algorithm.

summary.span: 使用指定的金鑰和初始化向量 (IV) 建立對稱 3DES 解密子物件。

span.span: Creates a symmetric 3DES decryptor object with the specified key and initialization vector (IV).
A symmetric 3DES decryptor object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會解密加密的訊息，建立使用多載具有相同的簽章。This method decrypts an encrypted message created using the overload with the same signature. > [!NOTE] > 如果您已建立物件使用的現有保存的金鑰和您想要使用的金鑰解密訊息時，您想要設定屬性並無參數然後呼叫多載，而是，則為使用此方法會建立所指定暫時金鑰`rgbKey`參數。If you've created the object using an existing persisted key and you want to make use of that key when decrypting the message, you want to set the property and then call the parameterless overload instead; otherwise, using this method will create an ephemeral key as specified by the `rgbKey` parameter.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 的大小不適用於此演算法。

span.span: is not a valid size for this algorithm.
-or-

exception.span: 的大小不符合此演算法的區塊大小。

span.span: size does not match the block size for this algorithm.

exception.span: 是此演算法的已知弱式金鑰，因此無法使用。

span.span: is a known weak key for this algorithm and cannot be used.
-or-
is .

span.span: Creates a 3DES symmetric encryptor object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform CreateEncryptor() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateEncryptor () As ICryptoTransform

summary.span: 使用目前的索引鍵和初始化向量 () 建立對稱 3DES 加密子物件。

span.span: Creates a symmetric 3DES encryptor object using the current key and initialization vector ().
A symmetric 3DES encryptor object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來加密訊息，然後使用多載具有相同的簽章，來解密此方法的結果。Use this method to encrypt a message and then use the overload with the same signature to decrypt the result of this method.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform CreateEncryptor (byte[] rgbKey, byte[] rgbIV);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform CreateEncryptor(unsigned int8[] rgbKey, unsigned int8[] rgbIV) cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateEncryptor (rgbKey As Byte(), rgbIV As Byte()) As ICryptoTransform
public: override System::Security::Cryptography::ICryptoTransform ^ CreateEncryptor(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ rgbKey, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ rgbIV);

param.name: rgbKey
param.span: 3DES 演算法所用的祕密金鑰。

span.span: The secret key to use for the 3DES algorithm.

param.span: 金鑰大小必須是 192 位元。

span.span: The key size must be 192 bits.

param.name: rgbIV
param.span: 3DES 演算法所用的初始化向量。

span.span: The initialization vector to use for the 3DES algorithm.

summary.span: 使用指定的金鑰和初始化向量 (IV) 建立對稱 3DES 加密子物件。

span.span: Creates a symmetric 3DES encryptor object with the specified key and initialization vector (IV).
A symmetric 3DES encryptor object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來加密訊息，然後使用多載具有相同的簽章，來解密此方法的結果。Use this method to encrypt a message and then use the overload with the same signature to decrypt the result of this method. > [!NOTE] > 如果您已建立物件使用的現有保存的金鑰和您想要使用的金鑰加密的訊息時，您想要設定屬性並無參數然後呼叫多載，而是，則為使用此方法會建立所指定暫時金鑰`rgbKey`參數。If you've created the object using an existing persisted key and you want to make use of that key when encrypting the message, you want to set the property and then call the parameterless overload instead; otherwise, using this method will create an ephemeral key as specified by the `rgbKey` parameter.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 的大小不適用於此演算法。

span.span: is not a valid size for this algorithm.
-or-

exception.span: 的大小不符合此演算法的區塊大小。

span.span: size does not match the block size for this algorithm.

exception.span: 是此演算法的已知弱式金鑰，因此無法使用。

span.span: is a known weak key for this algorithm and cannot be used.
-or-
is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void GenerateKey() cil managed

summary.span: 產生 3DES 演算法所用的隨機金鑰。

span.span: Generates a random key to use for the 3DES algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: public override byte[] Key { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property Key As Byte()
public: virtual property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Key { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ value); };
member this.Key : byte[] with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 演算法的金鑰。

span.span: Gets or sets the key for the algorithm.
The key for the algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您已建立物件使用的現有保存的金鑰，當您讀取的值時屬性，將會進行嘗試匯出金鑰。If you've created the object using an existing persisted key, when you read the value of the property, an attempt to export the key will be made. 在此情況下，如果索引鍵不是可匯出、就會擲回。In this case, if the key is not exportable, a will be thrown. 除了，如果您設定的值屬性，保存的金鑰將無法再使用，而且暫存的索引鍵將改為使用。In addition to that, if you set the value of the property, the persisted key will no longer be used and a temporary key will be used instead. 如果您需要使用一次，持續性索引鍵的新執行個體類別必須建立。If you need to use the persisted key again, a new instance of class needs to be created.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int KeySize { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property KeySize As Integer
public: virtual property int KeySize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.KeySize : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 演算法使用之祕密金鑰的大小 (以位元為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bits, of the secret key used by the algorithm.

value.span: 演算法使用之祕密金鑰的大小 (以位元為單位)。

span.span: The size, in bits, of the secret key used by the algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您已建立物件使用的現有保存的金鑰，而且您設定的值屬性，保存的金鑰將無法再使用，而且暫存的索引鍵將改為使用。If you've created the object using an existing persisted key and you set the value of the property, the persisted key will no longer be used and a temporary key will be used instead. 如果您需要使用一次，持續性索引鍵的新執行個體類別必須建立。If you need to use the persisted key again, a new instance of class needs to be created.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property LegalKeySizes As KeySizes()
public: virtual property cli::array <System::Security::Cryptography::KeySizes ^> ^ LegalKeySizes { cli::array <System::Security::Cryptography::KeySizes ^> ^ get(); };
